00051 class  TestSyncSource : public SyncSource {
00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00061     TestSyncSource(const WCHAR* name, SyncSourceConfig *sc) ;
00062 
00063     // TestSyncSource
00064     ~TestSyncSource();
00065 
00066     /*
00067      * Return the first SyncItem of all.
00068      * It is used in case of slow or refresh sync
00069      * and retrieve the entire data source content.
00070      */
00071     SyncItem* getFirstItem();
00072 
00073     /*
00074      * Return the next SyncItem of all.
00075      * It is used in case of slow or refresh sync
00076      * and retrieve the entire data source content.
00077      */
00078     SyncItem* getNextItem();
00079 
00080     /*
00081      * Return the first SyncItem of new one. It is used in case of fast sync
00082      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00083      */
00084     SyncItem* getFirstNewItem();
00085 
00086     /*
00087      * Return the next SyncItem of new one. It is used in case of fast sync
00088      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00089      */
00090     SyncItem* getNextNewItem();
00091 
00092     /*
00093      * Return the first SyncItem of updated one. It is used in case of fast sync
00094      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00095      */
00096     SyncItem* getFirstUpdatedItem() ;
00097 
00098     /*
00099      * Return the next SyncItem of updated one. It is used in case of fast sync
00100      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00101      */
00102     SyncItem* getNextUpdatedItem();
00103 
00104     /*
00105      * Return the first SyncItem of updated one. It is used in case of fast sync
00106      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00107      */
00108     SyncItem* getFirstDeletedItem();
00109 
00110     /*
00111      * Return the next SyncItem of updated one. It is used in case of fast sync
00112      * and retrieve the new data source content.
00113      */
00114 
00115     SyncItem* getFirstItemKey();
00116 
00117     /*
00118      * Return the key of the next SyncItem of all.
00119      * It is used in case of refresh sync
00120      * and retrieve all the keys of the data source.
00121      */
00122     SyncItem* getNextItemKey();
00123 
00124 
00125     SyncItem* getNextDeletedItem();
00126 
00127     void setItemStatus(const WCHAR* key, int status);
00128 
00129     int addItem(SyncItem& item);
00130 
00131     int updateItem(SyncItem& item);
00132 
00133     int deleteItem(SyncItem& item);
00134     
00135     int removeAllItems(); //Not implemented
00136 
00137     int beginSync();
00138 
00139     int endSync();
00140 
00141     ArrayElement* clone() { return 0; }
00142 };
